titleStmt.title: The distiller of London Compiled and set forth by the speciall licence and command of the Kings most excellent Majesty: for the sole use of the Company of Distillers of London. And by them to bee duly observed and practized.
titleStmt.author: Company of Distillers of London.
Mayerne, Théodore Turquet de, Sir, 1573-1655.
Cademan, Thomas, Sir, 1590?-1651.

notesStmt.note: Editors' foreword signed: Theodorus de Mayerne .. Thomas Cademan.
The final leaves are: (1) a woodcut of the arms of the Company of Distillers, and (2) "The oath of every free member".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
